data.lyric:
[ti:Staring at the Sun (feat. SZA) (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone/SZA]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Staring At The Sun (Explicit) - Post Malone/SZA
[00:09.45]Oh
[00:15.31]Wait
[00:16.91]Wait
[00:18.02]I know you gotta a lotta s**t you'd like to say
[00:21.31]To say to say
[00:23.24]Slow down think you gettin' lil' carried away
[00:26.29]You're too close
[00:27.52]To the flame
[00:28.68]But you don't
[00:30.02]Wanna turn around
[00:32.01]Like you got me figured out
[00:34.53]But girl what I can promise is I'll let you down
[00:39.63]So don't put up a fight
[00:42.19]You'll get lost in the light
[00:44.69]If you keep
[00:45.62]Staring at the sun you won't see
[00:48.22]What you have become this can't be
[00:50.73]Everything you thought it was
[00:53.19]Blinded by the thought of us so
[00:55.75]Give me a chance I will
[00:58.30]F**k up again I warned
[01:00.84]You in advance
[01:03.07]But you just keep on starin' at the sun
[01:10.91]Wait
[01:13.53]I know I got a lot of s**t going on with me
[01:18.61]Now we're free to loving anyone other than me
[01:22.74]I try to rewind
[01:23.64]I get reminded the time that we were nobody
[01:27.19]Can't get to close and don't let it go
[01:30.90]Cause I can count on you to let me down
[01:35.17]I won't put up a fight
[01:37.85]I got lost in the light
[01:40.19]If you keep
[01:41.18]Staring at the sun you won't see
[01:43.74]What you have become this can't be
[01:46.28]Everything you thought it was
[01:48.65]Blinded by the thought of us so
[01:51.33]Give me a chance I will
[01:53.86]F**k up again I warned
[01:56.34]You in advance
[01:58.53]But you just keep on starin' at the sun
[02:02.09]Wait
[02:04.27]Gotta couple little things I'd like to say
[02:08.82]Today is not your day
[02:14.07]You should walk away
[02:18.92]But you won't listen
[02:20.31]You just keep on
[02:21.52]Staring at the sun you won't see
[02:24.14]What you have become this can't be
[02:26.65]Everything you thought it was
[02:29.08]Blinded by the thought of us so
[02:31.73]Give me a chance I will
[02:34.25]F**k up again I warned
[02:36.75]You in advance
[02:38.94]But you just keep on starin' at the sun
data.trans:
[ti:Staring at the Sun (feat. SZA) (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone/SZA]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:09.45]//
[00:15.31]等一下
[00:16.91]请等一下
[00:18.02]我知道你有很多想说的话
[00:21.31]想说的话
[00:23.24]慢慢来 我感觉你很激动有点忘乎所以
[00:26.29]你与火焰的距离
[00:27.52]太近太近
[00:28.68]但是你不会扑火
[00:30.02]你想要转身
[00:32.01]如同你让我想通一样
[00:34.53]女孩呀 我能许下的承诺就是我会让你失望
[00:39.63]所以不要反抗
[00:42.19]你会迷失在阳光下
[00:44.69]如果你一直一直
[00:45.62]盯着太阳
[00:48.22]你就不会发现你变成了什么样子
[00:50.73]这不可能是你想象的一切
[00:53.19]被你我的想法蒙蔽了双眼
[00:55.75]所以给我一个机会
[00:58.30]我还是会将事情搞砸
[01:00.84]我已经提前警告过你
[01:03.07]但你还是继续凝视着太阳
[01:10.91]等一下
[01:13.53]我知道自己发生了很多事情
[01:18.61]现在我们自由了 除了我 你可以爱任何人
[01:22.74]我试着倒带
[01:23.64]人们却提醒我时间不会为任何人停留
[01:27.19]不能靠得太近 不能放手
[01:30.90]因为我可以指望你让我失望
[01:35.17]所以我不会反抗
[01:37.85]我会迷失在阳光下
[01:40.19]如果你一直一直
[01:41.18]盯着太阳
[01:43.74]你就不会发现你变成了什么样子
[01:46.28]这不可能是你想象的一切
[01:48.65]被你我的想法蒙蔽了双眼
[01:51.33]所以给我一个机会
[01:53.86]我还是会将事情搞砸
[01:56.34]我已经提前警告过你
[01:58.53]但你还是继续凝视着太阳
[02:02.09]等一下
[02:04.27]我还有一些想说的话
[02:08.82]今天不是你的幸运日
[02:14.07]你应该径直走开
[02:18.92]但是你不会听进去
[02:20.31]你只会继续
[02:21.52]盯着太阳
[02:24.14]你就不会发现你变成了什么样子
[02:26.65]这不可能是你想象的一切
[02:29.08]被你我的想法蒙蔽了双眼
[02:31.73]所以给我一个机会
[02:34.25]我还是会将事情搞砸
[02:36.75]我已经提前警告过你
[02:38.94]但你还是继续凝视着太阳
